rows.label: qst201612_msg0001
rows.name:
Good news, friends!
Empire issue permit for concert!

rows.label: qst201612_msg0002
rows.name:
Considering audience numbers and
stage design, size of this concert is
unprecedented! World record!

rows.label: qst201612_msg0004
rows.name: Is Pi TRYING to scare Nanakoori...?

rows.label: qst201612_msg0005
rows.name:
Pi is only Nopon, sometime get
overexcited. Apologies.

rows.label: qst201612_msg0006
rows.name:
Anyhow, preparations for concert
be completed soon!

rows.label: qst201612_msg0007
rows.name: Don't rest on laurels yet, friends!

rows.label: qst201612_msg0008
rows.name:
Mmm... I...don't know
if I can manage...

rows.label: qst201612_msg0010
rows.name:
That's right.
Just carry on as you've been doing,
and everything will be dandy.

rows.label: qst201612_msg0012
rows.name:
All right! So, Pi go ahead to
Jakolo's Inn in Alba Margen.
We hired inn as green room.

rows.label: qst201612_msg0013
rows.name:
When friend Nanakoori ready,
come rendezvous there!

rows.label: qst201612_msg0014
rows.name:
Friend should bring Nanakoori here.
Have important thing to tell!
